resources.string: Merci d'avoir choisi mon merveilleux outil pour vous aider dans vôtre quete pour installer le framework d'Xposed!
Une petite liste de ce que cet outil peut faire!
J'ai mis en œuvre de nombreuses autres fonctionnalités et des rubriques pour vous!
Dans le cas où vous rencontreriez des erreurs lors de l'ouverture de mon outil. S'IL VOUS PLAÎT signalez ce problème en allant dans "Gérer" puis dans "signaler un problème"
S'il vous plaît continuer avec prudence l'ors de l'installation d'Xposed
Xposed Framework is already installed...however if you are updating the framework please uninstall the previous version and then install the latest version
Please reboot the device...the xposed framework was successfully installed!
Please do NOT reboot the device...the xposed framework was NOT successfully installed!
No Directories need to be created!
Would you like to report it?
Please tap copy stack.trace and paste in the describe your issues so it will be easier to fix the issue(s)!
To keep the integrity of your device you may NOT modify any part of the scripts in ANY way as it WILL bricked your device if ANY further attempts of modification are made!
The following permissions MUST be granted to continue...
Can you grant me...Internet and access network state?
Can you grant me...Read and Write external storage?
Xposed installer\'s version is NOT compatible!
ERROR: xposed installer is NOT Installed!
This device was previously blocked from installing xposed framwework...however analysis state that your device is in indeed compatible!
